name: Testing Conditionals
description:
Create a form with a 1 - 10 NPS question asking how sexy you feel

If the user answers 1 - 5, provide a long text question asking them to expand on why they do not feel so sexy

If the user answers 6 - 10, provide a dropdown that has the options "hell yeah" and "Yeah you do"

formDefinition.title: Testing Conditionals
formDefinition.description: Please rate how sexy you feel and provide additional information based on your rating.

elements.name: nps_sexy_feeling
elements.title: On a scale of 1 to 10, how sexy do you feel?

elements.name: not_sexy_reason
elements.title: Please explain why you do not feel so sexy.

elements.name: sexy_confirmation
elements.title: You rated yourself pretty high, care to confirm?
